Class CompanyDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.project.dao.CompanyDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDAO

    public class CompanyDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO
    The Class CompanyDBDAO implements CompanyDAO interface. Providing methods to INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE and SELECT data from and to MySQL database.
